short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Controls brightness of the videoplayer in Twitch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Twitch Brightness Controller is an extension designed to adjust the brightness of the video player on any Twitch channel, making it particularly useful for reducing eye strain during night time viewing. Click on the settings(the gear icon) where you go to adjust resolution of the stream and at the very bottom you will find the brightness range !Look at the picture in screenshots !
